title: Rocky.Day1.Evening.Start
body:
Hey what's up, I'm rocky
You look like the new channeler on one of the verminstone mine shafts, is that right?
So, the caves are filled with bugs, they glow, they seem to really hate it when you take their verminstone
I'm not sure why a bug needs the fucking rocks, but nature and all that
Anyway, I'm sure you've felled a few that got in your way right?
You might have seen one or two of the others go up to em and yank the teeth out
Weird right? Yeah it's fucking weird, but there's a real good reason
If you take those teeth, and you grind em up real good
then you apply some heat, let it sit for a bit
and then you take the little crystals that form, and smoke that shit
It goes by a lot of names but we just call it Fang
This being an isolated slave labor mine and refinery, like, who wouldn't be getting ripped all the time?
Fang's great, try it some time if you really want to.
But really, if you bring up some bug teeth, I can get you all some stuff.
I can get you just about anything, I have access to the managment bunks
All for bug teeth, don't try to make Fang yourself, I mean you can try
Also considering the life expectancy of folks that work the Verminstone shafts, well. shit I'd probably be high as fuck too
I've yammered on pretty much long enough, but listen. Bug Teeth, for whatever.

title: Rocky.Day2.Evening.Start
body:
Hey, you got any...uhhh
...bug teeth?
I'm just joshing, the guards look the other way
reason they do is because they're also on Fang, a lot
of course, they gotta take a drug test if they fuck up
and usually if they do, they'll test positive and get fired.
I guess getting fired isn't the worst thing, those humans will never share our fate
weird, that
But yeah, nearly everyone here, if they're doing anything menial, they're gonna be high as fuck after a point
Fang is addicting, you smoke your first puff and it's like you can feel happiness again
But after a while it's like anything else, you just need it to keep going
Maintaining, is what they call it
I really don't judge anyone who smokes it, except the guards and the other humans
Now if they catch you with it, on a bad day, they'll just throw you in the cells for it
And if they throw you in the cells, they figure you ain't working, so they only feed you half as much
And you're addicted, so you go through withdrawl while you're in there, it fucking sucks
so when they come out of the cells they're starving and they need a fix
...I'm sorry I've just been blabbering this whole time, do you actually have bug teeth for me
[[Yeah here's some *debug_give_bugteeth*|Rocky.Day2.Evening.Yes]]
[[I aint got shit for you|Rocky.Day2.Evening.No]]
[[You seem to profit off other's suffering, do you feel bad?|Rocky.Day2.Evening.Maybe]]

title: Rocky.Day2.Evening.Yes
body:
Oh great.
So here's what I got right now
[[Firewood|Rocky.Buy.Firewood]]
[[Extra Gruel|Rocky.Buy.ExtraGruel]]
[[Floor Rug|Rocky.Buy.Rug]]
[[Fang crystals|Rocky.Buy.Fang]]

title: Rocky.Day2.Evening.Maybe
body:
Profit? Suffering
Look, if I could buy my own freedom back, I would
But i can't do that, you can't do that either
Both you and I, we've been trapped in this horrible machine
Me, I can move around this fucking place, they let me anywhere
and I can sneak anywhere else I need to go

title: Rocky.Day2.Evening.No
body: Alright. Well, if you want anything, you know where to find me

title: Rocky.Buy.ExtraGruel
body:
Ah extra food. It's all pretty terrible, I think they thicken it with sand or something.
Awful
[[Rocky.Day2.Evening.No]]

title: Rocky.Buy.Firewood
body:
Expensive shit. All the industrial work of the mine and refinery reduced the surrounding wood to rot
So they bring this in by the trainload
[[Rocky.Day2.Evening.No]]

title: Rocky.Buy.Fang
body:
Oh you're going for the strong shit right away huh
Like, I'm not going to stop you, but once you start
well, it's really hard to get off
[[Rocky.Day2.Evening.No]]
